A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Think back to when only the original trilogy existed.
If someone told you that in the year 2017 they'd make a film where Leia flies through space and Luke becomes an old petulant preteen coward\, you'd laugh! No one would be that stupid\, right? Well\, apparently Rian Johnson is precisely that stupid.

But the absolute worst thing about this movie is ROSE!
How did they ever come up with a character that annoying??
What pit did she crawl out off?? Think Jar Jar Binks is annoying? He aint got nothing on ROSE! Even the orgs are less annoying! 
Only character that comes close to being as annoying is that woman with mauve hair.
